author: COMSOL
description: This is a benchmark problem for an axisymmetric transient thermal analysis. The temperature on the boundaries changes from 0°C to 1000°C at the start of the simulation. The temperature at 190 s from the analysis is compared with a NAFEMS benchmark solution.
label: heat_transient_axi.mph
name: root

settings.name: curvedinterior
